Author: roastedpepper
Text: Iâ€™m also depressed and while I know this is a super cliche suggestion, taking walks while listening to podcasts really helps me. It numbs me out and distracts me from the awful thoughts.

Author: NewBullMoose
Text: Anything you can do to distract yourself and also make yourself feel better (similar to the food) should help. I love playing rocket league while listening to some music or something and can easily pass two to three hours without even noticing.
